snippet: The role of meditation in brain development has been linked to the idea of increased cognitive capabilities.
abstract: Many people who practice meditation tout its beneficial effects on their brains; role that it plays in brain development has been the subject of several theories and a number of studies.
lead_paragraph: The role of meditation in brain development has been linked to the idea of increased cognitive capabilities.

headline.seo: Role of Meditation in Brain Development Gains Scientific Support
headline.main: In Sitting Still, a Bench Press for the Brain
headline.print_headline: In Sitting Still, A Bench Press For the Brain
